project.name: C-C682A-SUBV-02-ST01-DT03-DF15-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C682A-SUBV-02-ST01-DT03-DF15-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a hex integer from the input. If hexinteger is negative, ignore. If hexinteger < 0x0000FFFF, do nothing. If hexinteger >= 0x0000FFFF try to zero-out the upper two bytes using char pointers. Perform an incorrect calculation, and rather than zero-ing out the upper two bytes, zero out two different bytes, which corrupts pointers on the stack and results in a seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C682A-SUBV-02-ST01-DT03-DF15-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a hex integer from the input. If hexinteger is negative, ignore. If hexinteger < 0x0000FFFF, do nothing. If hexinteger >= 0x0000FFFF try to zero-out the upper two bytes using char pointers. Perform an incorrect calculation, and rather than zero-ing out the upper two bytes, zero out two different bytes, which corrupts pointers on the stack and results in a seg fault.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
